titleStmt.title: A placat of the High and Mighty Lords the States General of the United Netherlands; conteining a sharp prohibition to the inhabitants of these lands, and also concerning the navigation and commerce of the neutrals to the havens of France and England, and also goods of contrabande, and assurances of ships and goods belonging to the subjects of the Kings of France and Great Brittany.
Placcaet van de Hooge Mogende Heeren Staten Generael der Vereenichde Nederlanden. English and Dutch
titleStmt.author: United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Jacobus Scheltus printer to the High and Mighty Lords the States General, dwelling in the Inner Hoff,

notesStmt.note: English and Dutch in parallel columns.
Imprint from English colophon. Dutch colophon reads: In s'Gravenhage, by Jacobus Scheltus, drucker van de Hoogh Mog. Heeren Staten Generael, woonende op het Binnen-Hoff. Anno 1672.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
